promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple fox normal-type pokemon wearing a prismatic mask. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Prismasker, a a massive simple fox normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Burn Booster, Hand Fling. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "normal" or "Prismasker". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, fox-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: A cunning creature of the meadows, it uses Burn Booster to ignite prey from afar, then hustles it with Hand Fling. Stealthy and elusive.
